name: Bard
lore: Bards are charismatic loremasters and storytellers, using their music, magic, and knowledge to inspire, manipulate emotions, and unravel mysteries. They roam the world seeking new tales to tell and ancient truths to uncover.

subclasses.name: Minstrel
subclasses.description: Masters of music and magic, Minstrels enchant audiences with melodic performances. They travel far and wide, spreading tales of heroism and romance, and using their art to uplift spirits and influence hearts.

subclasses.name: Skald
subclasses.description: Warriors who combine the power of their voices with martial prowess. Skalds inspire their allies in battle through epic recitations and battle chants, bolstering their courage and strength.

subclasses.name: Loremaster
subclasses.description: Scholars and historians who unravel mysteries and uncover ancient secrets. Loremasters decipher ancient texts and understand arcane symbolism, using their knowledge to protect ancient artifacts and uncover hidden knowledge.

subclasses.name: College of Shadows
subclasses.description: Masters of deception and subterfuge, Bards of the College of Shadows specialize in espionage and manipulation. They operate in the shadows, gathering secrets and pulling strings from behind the scenes to influence powerful individuals and organizations.
